alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 1:55PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Collier County through 230 PM EST... At 155 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bonita Springs to 6 miles southwest of East Naples. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Golden Gate Estates, Naples Park, Belle Meade, Marco Island Airport, Orangetree, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Lely, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, and Goodland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
